intro.title: Introduction
intro.prose_1: We here at Spec were specifically interested in investigating differences in linguistic style between male and female Supreme Court Justices and among the Justices themselves.
intro.prose_2: Our initial hypothesis was that female justices tend to soften or reduce the impact of their words by using phrases like "Would you like to consider the posibility..." or "I would have thought perhaps..." also known as hedging. We were also interested in how the sentiment of dialogue changed over time, as well as over the course of a justice's lifetime. Our investigation led us through the following questions:
intro.closing_prose: Please enjoy our journey navigating through a 100,000 row data frame of Supreme Court Case Dialogue.
